title: Game crashes before loading screen
body:
In 2/10 games it crashes before geting to loading screen, in rest it works perfectly. And i got leaverbuster because of this.

1.What is the problem ?

2. WIll leaverbuster affect my honor system ?

replies.body: Getting those crashes on the loading screen might mean that some of the game files are corrupted. Try running a quick repair through the client options and test it in some custom games to see if you still get any crashes. Also, I believe any penalties like chat restrictions or leaverbusters can drop or lock your [**Honor Level**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148).
